section.p: 'The territory over which authority is exercised.' - dictionary.com. This class represents the organization that has authority over a given territory or area of endeavor. In other words, this class represents a government or governmental agency. The government may be a national (e.g., Canada) or territorial (e.g., Virginia).

ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] id with data type Code
An unique string or token used to identify the jurisdiction

Contains exactly one [1..1] name with data type String
The name of the jurisdiction
